name: Uliana's Strength
flavorText: “Uliana questioned the orthodoxy that the gods were actual beings, asking if they might not instead be metaphors to guide the monk’s spiritual development. For her temerity, she was ordered to wander the world and seek repentance.”-Poldamyr's Histories of the Veradani
flavorTextHtml: “Uliana questioned the orthodoxy that the gods were actual beings, asking if they might not instead be metaphors to guide the monk’s spiritual development. For her temerity, she was ordered to wander the world and seek repentance.”-Poldamyr's Histories of the Veradani

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Every third hit of your Spirit Generators applies Exploding Palm.(4) Set:     
 Your Seven-Sided Strike deals 777% its total damage with each hit. All damage taken is reduced by 77% for 7 seconds after applying Exploding Palm to an enemy.(6) Set:     
 Increase the damage of your Exploding Palm by 9000% and your Seven-Sided Strike detonates your Exploding Palm.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Every third hit of your Spirit Generators applies Exploding Palm.
(4) Set:
Your Seven-Sided Strike deals 777% its total damage with each hit. All damage taken is reduced by 77% for 7 seconds after applying Exploding Palm to an enemy.
(6) Set:
Increase the damage of your Exploding Palm by 9000% and your Seven-Sided Strike detonates your Exploding Palm.
